### Tele-Law Cases by Total Volume {data-height=1000}

```{r fig.height=50}
# Colors
colors = read.csv("./Color_Pallete.csv")
blue_pallete = colors[['Blue_Pallete']]
#custom_colors <- viridis::mako(n = 10)

# Most popular authors by reviews
combined_data %>% 
  arrange(desc(Advice_Enabled_FY23)) %>% 
  head(10) %>% 
  hchart('column', hcaes(x = State, y = Advice_Enabled_FY23 ,color = blue_pallete)) %>%
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_google()) %>% 
  hc_tooltip(pointFormat = '<b>Number of Beneficiaries: </b> {point.y} <br>') %>% 
  hc_title(text = 'Biggest Beneficiary States of Tele-Law Service',
           style = list(fontSize = '20px', fontWeight = 'bold')) %>% 
  hc_subtitle(text = 'By Total Number of People Who Enabled Legal Advice',
              style = list(fontSize = '14px'))
```
